channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【If the Format­Message function fails, and I requested that it allocate a buffer, do I have to free the buffer?】如果 formatMessage 函数失败，并且我要求它分配缓冲区，我是否必须释放缓冲区？
item.description: 【A customer called the Format­Message function with the FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER flag, and they weren't sure what to do if the function fails (by returning 0). Do they have to free the buffer by calling Local­Free? No, you don't have to free the buffer. In fact, on f】一个客户使用format_message_allocate_buffer标志称为格式的函数，他们不确定如果功能失败（通过返回0）该怎么办。他们是否必须通过致电LocalFree来释放缓冲区？不，您不必释放缓冲区。实际上，在F上

item.title: 【Dubious security vulnerability: If I perform this complex series of manual steps, I can crash a program I am running】可疑的安全漏洞：如果我执行此复杂的一系列手动步骤，我可能会崩溃我正在运行的程序
item.description: 【A security vulnerability report arrived that went roughly like this. In Program X, click on the triangle icon and hold the mouse down. Drag the triangle icon to the green box in the corner, and while still holding the mouse down, press Alt+F4 to close the window. The program will】一份安全漏洞报告到了，大概是这样进行的。在程序X中，单击三角图标并将鼠标按下。将三角图标拖到角落的绿色框中，并且在仍将鼠标固定下来时，按Alt+F4关闭窗口。该程序将

item.title: 【German language cheat sheet: On changing quantities】德语备忘单：变化数量
item.description: 【Somehow, I must have missed out on learning phrases of changes in quantity in German, so I need a cheat sheet. Trend】不知何故，我一定错过了德语数量变化的学习短语，所以我需要一张备忘单。趋势

item.title: 【Local AI + .NET = AltText Magic in One C# Script】本地AI + .net =一个C＃脚本中的AltText魔术
item.description: 【Need to generate image descriptions fast? In this post, we’ll show how to combine .NET 10’s new capabilities with local AI models to create smart AltText — all in one simple C# file. It’s a fun way to explore what AI can do beyond chat. AltText Generation with Local AI Models and dotnet run app.cs ✨ I】需要快速生成图像描述吗？在这篇文章中，我们将展示如何将.NET 10的新功能与本地AI模型相结合，以创建Smart AltText，这都是一个简单的C＃文件。这是一种有趣的方式，可以探索AI在聊天之外可以做什么。使用本地AI模型和Dotnet Run App.cs✨II

item.title: 【What’s New in vcpkg (June 2025)】VCPKG的新功能（2025年6月）
item.description: 【This blog post summarizes changes to the vcpkg package manager as part of the 2025.06.13 registry release, 2025-04-16,】此博客文章总结了VCPKG软件包管理器的更改，作为2025.06.13注册表版本的一部分，2025-04-16，

item.title: 【Automating Secure and Scalable AI Deployments on Azure with HashiCorp】使用Hashicorp自动化安全和可扩展的AI部署
item.description: 【While the promise of AI continues to generate momentum, many organizations face a familiar challenge: getting AI projects beyond the prototype phase. According to Gartner, only 30% of AI initiatives make it into production, and RAND reports that up to 80% fail to deliver expected outcomes. 】尽管AI的承诺继续产生动力，但许多组织面临着一个熟悉的挑战：将AI项目超出原型阶段。根据Gartner的说法，只有30％的AI计划将其用于生产，Rand报告说，高达80％的人无法提供预期的结果。

item.title: 【Introducing the Awesome GitHub Copilot Customizations repo】介绍很棒的Github副副定制存储库
item.description: 【Today we're excited to announce the launch of the Awesome GitHub Copilot Customizations repo! The Awesome Copilot repo is a community-driven resource with custom instructions, reusable prompts, and custom chat modes that helps you get consisten】今天，我们很高兴宣布出色的Github Copilot Customizations Repo发布！ Awesome Copilot Repo是一种由社区驱动的资源，具有自定义说明，可重复使用的提示和自定义聊天模式，可帮助您获得一致

item.title: 【Markdown Support Arrives for Work Items】降价支持到达工作项目
item.description: 【After several months in private preview and many bug fixes along the way, we’re excited to announce that Markdown support in large text fields is now generally available! 🎉 🦄 How it works By default, all existing and new work items will continue using the HTML editor for large text fields. However, you now have the】经过几个月的私人预览和许多错误修复后，我们很高兴地宣布，现在通常可以在大型文本字段中提供降价支持！ 🎉🎉默认情况下它的工作原理，所有现有工作项目将继续使用HTML编辑器作为大型文本字段。但是，您现在有

item.title: 【Why doesn't LVIF_INDENT work without an image list?】为什么 lvif_ 缩进在没有图像列表的情况下工作？
item.description: 【The LVIF_INDENT property of the Win32 classic listview control lets you indent an item in report view. The units of indentation are the size of the image list. But that requires an image list. Why does it require an image list? The indentation feature of the classic listview control was added for Internet Mail an】Win32经典listView控件的LVIF_INDENT属性使您可以在报告视图中缩进项目。压痕单位是图像列表的大小。但这需要图像列表。为什么需要图像列表？为Internet邮件添加了经典ListView控件的缩进功能

item.title: 【Microsoft build of Go Telemetry - Helping Us Build Better Tools】Microsoft构建Go Telemetry-帮助我们构建更好的工具
item.description: 【Starting with Go 1.25, we're enabling telemetry collection in the Microsoft build of Go to help us better understand how developers use our tools and prioritize future improvements. This data collection will provide valuable insights into usage patterns, performance characteristics, and common workflows that will directly i】从GO 1.25开始，我们在Microsoft Go Build of Go中启用遥测收集，以帮助我们更好地了解开发人员如何使用我们的工具并确定未来的改进。该数据收集将提供有关使用模式，性能特征和常见工作流程的有价值的见解，这将直接
